## Prompt ID
Which prompt are you reviewing?

`LRMC-TRIAGE-001`

## Feedback Summary
Briefly describe the issue or suggestion.

> The output justification is too vague for ambiguous clauses.

## Input Example
Provide the input that triggered the issue.

> “The vendor may transfer data to third countries.”

## Output Example
What did the model return?

> “Medium risk. May violate GDPR.”

## Suggested Fix
How would you improve the prompt?

> Add a constraint to require citation of specific GDPR articles.

## Additional Notes
Any other context or observations?

> This came up during a privacy SME review.
